meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>salary</kanji> <kanji>fee</kanji> are the moneys you get for your <vocabulary>salary</vocabulary>. These are your <vocabulary>wages</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>pay</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
